title: Unchained Alistar
body: I have subscribed to the youtube channel and followed on twitter but I still couldn't get the skin reward for it... Is there anyway riot can send me the rewards? Im oce server C1aude.

replies.body:
Hey C1aude, 

Be sure to send a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the evidence of you following/subscribing and they will be able to get you your rewards. 

Good luck :)
